release_note: Your Voice Our Action A heartfelt thank you for sharing your valuable insights and feedback on our last major update. Fueled by your suggestions we ve embarked on refining Craft together bringing a suite of enhancements and tweaks in this latest release and yes it still includes a couple of delightful surprises! Effortless Navigation: Dive into a more intuitive experience with the ability to effortlessly swap the left sidebar with a simple swipe when you are in a document. It s all about making your navigation smoother and more natural than ever before. Revamped Window and Tab Mastery: We ve tackled several quirks around window and tab management alongside state restoration ensuring a seamless transition between your creative flows. No more distractions just a streamlined pathway to your brilliance. Performance Power Up: Experience the difference with key performance improvements that might seem modest but pack a significant punch. We re talking smoother operations faster loading times and an overall boost that makes everything feel snappier. Whiteboard Beta Sensory Enhancements: Get ready to unleash your creativity with the beta version of our simple yet powerful Whiteboard complemented by the first set of sounds and haptics updates. It s a multi sensory experience designed to bring your ideas to life in the most vibrant way possible. This update is our way of saying thank you for being part of our journey. Dive in explore and let your creativity soar. The future is bright and together we re just getting started.

Kick Off the Year with a Bang: Craft s Monumental Update! Unleash Collaboration Like Never Before: Dive into the future of productivity with document based sharing! Now the power of collaboration extends to anyone anywhere no Craft account needed. Whether it s brainstorming with a client across the globe or getting feedback from a friend seamless collaboration on a single document has never been easier. A Sleeker Smarter Layout: Say hello to a revamped Craft experience that s not just beautiful but smarter too. We ve streamlined our layout to enhance clarity and ensure an optimized experience for every user especially our solo adventurers. Navigating your creative landscape in Craft is now more intuitive and delightful than ever. Surprises Galore: Brace yourself for a treasure trove of enhancements! From tiny tweaks that ll make you smile to massive overhauls that ll have you jumping for joy we ve packed this update with a dozen surprises both small and MUCH bigger. Craft is not just evolving it s revolutionizing the way you create share and collaborate. This is just the beginning. Dive into Craft s latest update and explore a world where your creativity knows no bounds and collaboration is boundless. Welcome to the next level of crafting your ideas into reality. Welcome to Craft Reloaded. Embrace the extraordinary. Update now and transform your Craft experience.

Quick Update Major Impact: We ve fine tuned our app with some essential bug fixes enhancing stability and smoothness so your experience is now more seamless and reliable than ever all in one swift update!

Quick Update Major Impact: We ve fine tuned our app with some essential bug fixes enhancing stability and smoothness so your experience is now more seamless and reliable than ever all in one swift update!

Tailor Your Domain: Make your mark with customizable craft.me domains! Now you can personalize your documents to reflect your brand or project creating a memorable and professional touch. Link Smarter Not Harder: We re expanding your horizons with a new set of smart links! Connect seamlessly to Confluence for work Airbnb for your next getaway Netflix for entertainment and dive into a world of Recipes and more for your daily inspirations. Rich Embeds Unlocked: Bring your content to life with our new embed support. From Figma s dynamic designs to the immersive landscapes of Google Maps and the rhythms of SoundCloud to the visuals of Vimeo it s all just a click away. Streamlined Sharing: You have the power to choose! With the new ability to hide the Table of Contents on shared pages you control the narrative and how your content is presented to your audience. Elevate your online presence and workflow with these latest features designed to enrich your experience and enhance your content. Update now and start crafting with style!

New Integrations Enhanced Sharing Controls Music Design United: Dive into a more diverse and creative workflow with our latest integrations! From Figma s intricate designs to the harmonious tunes of Apple Music we ve got you covered. Don t forget to explore Craft links and Mixcloud for an even richer experience. Refined Access Controls: Sharing is caring but we understand the need for boundaries. You can now define who gets a peek into your shared pages either by specifying individual email addresses or an entire domain. Keep your content exclusive yet accessible. Under the Hood Tweaks: We ve also ironed out some minor kinks to ensure your experience remains as smooth as silk. Because perfection lies in the details. Happy exploring in this updated universe of ours!

Unveiling Smart Link Integrations Seamless SSO support Level up your connectivity! We re thrilled to introduce smart link support for Linear GitHub Jira Vimeo and Loom. Instantly access key insights and content from these platforms right within our interface. And that s not all with the introduction of supporting Single Sign On SSO your login experience becomes as streamlined as ever. One click and you re in. Navigating your digital workspace just became a whole lot smarter and more integrated.

Introducing Inline Comments Revamped Link Previews: Step up your collaboration game with our sophisticated inline comments allowing you to share insights feedback and suggestions directly within your content s flow. But there s more we ve given our link previews a visual overhaul designed to provide you with a richer clearer glimpse into your linked content. It s a perfect blend of refined communication and enhanced aesthetics. Dive in to witness these improvements and elevate your content interaction!

Elevated Performance Polished Perfection: We ve fine tuned our engines and zapped those pesky bugs to ensure your experience is smoother and faster than ever before. Dive in and feel the difference because the best keeps getting better! Remember we re always refining and perfecting for you. Happy exploring!

YouTube Integration Unveiled: Elevate your document experience to cinematic levels! Now you can seamlessly embed any YouTube video directly into your document. No more switching between apps or tabs simply add your favorite videos and enjoy them inline right within your document. It s the perfect blend of productivity and entertainment making your documents more engaging and dynamic than ever before. Lights camera action!

Comment Thread Evolution: Ready to put an end to a topic and kick start a fresh conversation Our new update empowers you to resolve existing comment threads and initiate new ones on any blocks. Discuss deliberate and decide with more clarity! Microsoft Sign In Unleashed: We understand that simplicity is key which is why we ve integrated Microsoft Sign In! Access our app swiftly with your Microsoft credentials for a seamless more connected experience. Image Gallery on Steroids: Our image gallery just got a massive makeover! We ve turbo charged our load times so you can now feast your eyes on images faster than ever. Say goodbye to buffering and hello to instant visual gratification.

Over the past few weeks the Team was busy working on the next steps of the navigation changes. Also we are introducing a major Code Editor update: One liner support 20 different themes Many visual and usability improvements Take a look and let us know how you like it!

Reactions just got a whole lot smoother. We ve ironed out some wrinkles and made some small but mighty improvements. Say hello to a more efficient Craft! We ve polished our team management features making collaboration even easier. Remember your feedback helps us to improve. Keep those comments coming and enjoy the update!

This week the Team went on a bug hunt journey together. Based on your feedback we made multiple fixes and improvements around the whole app! Thanks for your continuous input! Please make sure that you send your findings at feedback craft.do!
This one is a a smaller update with: Move Space option Pull down menu updates Code Editor fixes Killing of a few additional pesky bugs
This one is a a smaller update with: Performance improvements Code Editor fixes Killing of a few additional pesky bugs
Over the past few weeks the Team was busy working on the next steps of the navigation changes. Take a look and let us know how you like it!

Over the past few weeks the Team was busy working on the next steps of the navigation changes. Also we are introducing a major Code Editor update: One liner support 20 different themes Many visual and usability improvements Take a look and let us know how you like it!

We are excited to share the first step of a set of navigation changes with all of you in this release! We updated the new Code Editor with multiple improvements based on your feedback. Introducing new beautiful empty states for Cards and Pages.

Our first release of 2023 introducing 2 amazing new features and many smaller improvements: A brand new Code Editor Faster easier to use and much much better! Introducing Page Breaks so you can structure your documents in a new way! Additionally: File handling improvement Better link handling Improving email address pasting

With the last release of the year we are introducing a number of updates around Tables and Craft Assistant! You can now set the first row or column as header for your tables When there s a row header your first row is fixed during sorting your table Many smaller updates around Craft Assistant for better usage Increasing the number of available requests Ability to disable Craft Assistant

Today we re excited to announce Craft AI Assistant a different take on how AI can help your workflow your writing process and how you distill and find information. Craft Assistant does not write your documents for you it helps you to elevate your work gain new insights and find the information you need quickly and easily. Also you can find many more improvements in this update such as: Reimagined Card Configuration with new card types Added .ai and .psd files won t convert to .pdf and .png files anymore Numbered list with images will be numbered correctly Handoff copy will paste the content correctly Improved Slash command

Over the last weeks we have been preparing the next chapter for tables: Introducing 13 different formulas SUM MIN MAX AVERAGE COUNT and more! New formatting option of the table cells plain text number percentage currency! You can now sort your table!

Over the last weeks we have been preparing the next chapter for tables: Introducing 13 different formulas SUM MIN MAX AVERAGE COUNT and more! New formatting option of the table cells plain text number percentage currency! You can now sort your table!

We are introducing two major updates in this version: Updated folders Pinned Document Quick Actions About section and more! Updated Craft links So you can open the app wherever you are when you got a link! Also many more smaller improvements such as: Option to select if you want to open a link in default browser or in the in app one Easy copying content from tables Typing will instantly create a code block

Introducing major editing updates! We worked hard to bring many highly requested changes and improvements for this week s release! Some of the most important changes: Links will open in Safari instead of in app browser Disabling markdown shortcuts in in line code style Improved cursor handling during multi line selection Moving to a new document will keep the selected font Command menu commands won t add an extra empty line In Focus mode the screen won t turn off Improved Share Sheet groupings Slash command improvements

Introducing major editing updates! We worked hard to bring many highly requested changes and improvements for this week s release! Some of the most important changes: Links will open in Safari instead of in app browser Disabling markdown shortcuts in in line code style Improved cursor handling during multi line selection Moving to a new document will keep the selected font Command menu commands won t add an extra empty line In Focus mode the screen won t turn off Improved Share Sheet groupings Slash command improvements

This week the Team went on a bug hunt journey together. Based on your feedback we made multiple fixes and improvements around the Editing experience. Thanks for your continuous input! Please make sure that you send your findings at feedback craft.do!

Over the last few weeks we have been preparing for the new semester. If you are a student a teacher or a faculty member you could grab Craft Pro for FREE! But we were thinking about everyone else as well and did a summer end clean up that includes more than 50 fixes and improvements starting from: Quick Actions Search Open Today s Daily Note or start a New Document Better support slash commands mentions and smileys for non Latin languages Opening the Code Editor on the Edit tab by default Support .heic files Ability to add a cover image with slash command And many more!

Our biggest release of 2022!! We completely reworked commenting and introduced mentions comment mentions and notifications. You will never miss anything whether you share a single document or Space s with others. Our Team has been using the new version of Craft in the past weeks and it s genuinely elevated the level of collaboration you can achieve with Craft! Whether you are planning your next holiday with your family sharing your plan for the next semester with your friends or working together with your colleagues. We would love to hear your first impressions and ideas so don t hesitate to email us at feedback craft.do!

Daily Notes Tasks update! You can complete cancel or move your tasks in a Daily Note quickly and easily. Also moving any of your blocks into or across Daily notes just got better either you drag and drop your block onto a Calendar Day or you select the block s and use the new Actions! We are also introducing over 50 improvements fixes and some exciting larger updates with this release! Some of the most important ones: Indented blocks look much better when you use focus or block decorations. Copy and Paste Style of a block. Changing Link previews from text to rich quickly and reloading the link info Selected block level stats! Copy Deeplink when right clicking on a document And many more! Which one is your favorite Let us know and drop us an email at feedback craft.do!

Learn more about how your shared content performs with the new shared content analytics! Also we got rid of a handful of bugs if you know any more of them or have an idea of what you would like to see please let us know at feedback craft.do!

Introducing two major features! Focus mode so you can write perfectly polished documents distraction free. You can now set your Shared Documents so visitors can copy and use them independently. Moreover we improved the Editing experience and added some heavily requested changes: Indentation improvements Bullet point visual updates Coloring of checkboxes and list items Easier access to layout settings for links and attachments

We are introducing over 30 improvements and fixes and some exciting larger updates with this release! Some of the most important ones: You can now set different language spell checks per page! Ability to change the default font type for new documents New text alignment option: Justify Password protected share pages

Customize your documents with the new background options whether it s a simple colored background or a beautiful image. Also with the updated share page you can take the look of your documents to the next level!
You can now access all your shared documents and pages under the Shared Content folder! We also did some quick spring clean up to fix improve on a few things.

Introducing Image Annotation from now on you can annotate images added to your Craft docs! We made a couple of improvements to the Code Editor and introduced 10 new supported languages. Iterated on Shortcuts now you will be able to pick which tab to open with the Open Space Shortcut. Made some changes for better navigation around the app when you are in a document. With improved performance on the Calendar tab your Daily Notes will load faster. We also did some quick summer end clean up to fix improve all around the app.

Introducing a completely redesigned Preferences section of the app including the first set of customisation options! We updated the small Widget to quickly open your Daily Notes. Also extended the Shortcuts to be able to add content to Daily Notes. Lastly we made some smaller fixes and improvements based on your feedback.

Introducing a completely redesigned Preferences section of the app including the first set of customisation options! We updated the small Widget to quickly open your Daily Notes. Also extended the Shortcuts to be able to add content to Daily Notes. Lastly we made some smaller fixes and improvements based on your feedback.

We continued to improve on the Editing experience and add some heavily requested changes and improvements. The most important changes are: Ability to change the color of the Folder icons additional Folder icons Search improvements Share sheet easier to pick which document to use Ability to paste content to the currently edited block Handling Smart quotes based on OS settings Search text will be auto focused after switching to search tab Fixed an issue where yesterday s daily note was still labeled today Fixed docx export with inline equation

In the new Calendar section you can interact with your calendar events add your notes to them start the call etc. You can easily create here your Daily Notes from now on too! Introducing Trash When you delete a document it will move to the Trash from you can restore or permanently delete it. Search got 10X faster! Further fixes and improvements: If you are in one of your folders importing documents will end up in this folder. When pasting markdown to the title the first block will become the title and the others will be added as content.

Introducing Trash When you delete a document it will move to the Trash from you can restore or permanently delete it. Search got 10X faster! Further fixes and improvements: If you are in one of your folders importing documents will end up in this folder. When pasting markdown to the title the first block will become the title and the others will be added as content.

We ve reimagined our iPad app! It s more powerful than ever yet feel more natively part of the OS. The sidebar is now always available and you can open documents or folders in tabs. Say Hi to our new App icon! With every update Craft becomes more and more powerful and we felt our app icon design should follow this trajectory as well.

Say Hi to our new App icon! With every update Craft becomes more and more powerful and we felt our app icon design should follow this trajectory as well.

We are introducing two major updates! From today you can add any file to your documents not only images videos and pdfs! Also Spell check is now available for everyone Furthermore you will find two smaller improvements in this version: You will be able to check the document s location and delete it from the document itself We updated the document title section so you can add smileys and use a set of commands

We continued to improve on the Editing experience and add some heavily requested smaller features. The most important changes are: Line style via slash command markdown shortcuts: : regular : strong . : light .. : extra light Swipe to indent added if the block is in edit mode Long tap on back button able to select where to jump back Images can be indented Fix Hook integration in Document details Easier drag and drop for multiple elements External storage update Desktop Document folders can be used for iCloud sync if those are enabled Option drag to duplicate blocks Copy paste fixes for MS Word lists and Handoff copy paste Fixed an issue where imported subfolders can t be rearranged

This week the Team went on a bug hunt journey together. Based on your feedback we made multiple fixes and improvements around the Editing experience. Thanks for your continuous input! Please make sure that you send your findings at feedback craft.do!
Improvements fixes around External Storage 20 new Folder Icons Toggle List fixes

Introducing External Locations support! It gives you the option to store your documents locally on your device whether it s your iPhone iPad or Mac or in any of your iCloud Drive folders. Updated Search component New Search UI with Document preview You can now search in code snippets too with the updated search component Search and quickly switch to another Space Two finger tap to open the search anywhere Toggle improvements Easy way to add children to toggles Added helper lines to visualize the hierarchy and with tapping on them quickly open close the children Import Export improvements Batch markdown export Assets will be exported next to the .md files Batch TextBundle export blocklinks will be generated Roam import TODO and DONE will be transformed to checkboxes Notion import ids won t appear in document titles blocklinks link to the correct headers Folder improvement Separate section of the folders above the documents Fixing search and external storage related issues

Introducing External Locations support! It gives you the option to store your documents locally on your device whether it s your iPhone iPad or Mac or in any of your iCloud Drive folders. Major Folder update! You can reorder customize with icons and add subfolders starting from this update prepare to organize Everything! INBOX FOLDER All your uncategorized documents now available in the Inbox folder. MOVE DOCUMENT You can now move a document into another as a subpage or move out a block or subpage from a document to start as a standalone new document. SWITCH EMAIL ACCOUNT Want to switch your email address Now you can do this from the app just pick an email address that you haven t used before for a Craft account.

INBOX FOLDER All your uncategorized documents now available in the Inbox folder. A couple of small fixes and optimizations here and there. Please take a moment of silence for the bugs that are no longer in Craft.

Introducing Sign in with Apple Quickest way to sign in and start using Craft! Improving our Export and Import capabilities One click export of your whole Space in multiple formats ability to import Markdown and TextBundle files. Introducing new Document List View Sort Options
